snippet: A new agreement by labor groups and European companies could improve working conditions in Bangladesh.
abstract: Editorial hails new, legally-binding agreement by labor groups and European companies that could improve working conditions for millions in Bangladesh; holds success of plan will depend heavily on its implementation and whether companies keep their commitment to pay for repairs and continue to buy clothes from Bangladesh.
lead_paragraph: A new agreement by labor groups and European companies could improve working conditions in Bangladesh.

headline.main: A Promising Approach to Factory Safety
